content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Station (x=24.0, y=-15.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining coal
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) collecting coal output

### Iron Ore Mining Station (x=-14.0, y=23.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) collecting iron ore output

### Copper Ore Mining Station (x=20.0, y=20.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining copper ore
- Wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5) collecting copper ore output
- Additional storage chest at (22.5, 21.5) containing copper ore

### Copper Smelting Station
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0)
- Output chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing copper plates
- Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving items between furnace and output chest

### Unused Smelting Setup
Two unused stone furnaces at:
- Position (-11.0, 20.0)
- Position (-9.0, 20.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing inserters in occupied spaces
- Before placing an inserter, check if the target position is already occupied by another entity
- When placing inserters near furnaces, ensure proper spacing and alignment with input/output positions
- The positions (23.5, 20.5) and (23.0, 20.5) were blocked by existing entities

### Furnace efficiency issues
- Multiple furnaces have no ingredients to smelt
- One furnace has a full fuel source inventory - consider better fuel management
- Ensure proper input/output connections for furnaces to maintain continuous operation
